with Bayside’s Roger’s Garage Affordable Housing Project** **Share this:** Click to share on X (Opens in new window)X Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window)Facebook Click to print (Opens in new window)Print The city has met with an outpouring of opposition from Bayside community members expressing concerns about the size of the project and traffic that roughly 50 units of additional housing might bring to the neighborhood — as well as concerns that the site contains environmental contaminants from its time spent as a commercial garage. **Share this:** Click to share on X (Opens
